title: Orion's Belt
description: Long exposure captures the gentle arc of stars trailing through a deep magenta night sky.

title: Framed Basilica
description: A study in composition, with a distant basilica perfectly framed by a rustic, silhouetted sculpture.

title: Girl at Door
description: A quiet, contemplative moment against the stark white texture of a weathered, snow-dusted door.

title: Fireworks at the Taste
description: Vibrant bursts of light illuminate a festive night, with a Ferris wheel standing sentinel over the celebration.

title: Girl at Pole
description: A portrait alive with color, where fiery red hair contrasts with the cool, smooth lines of an urban setting.

title: Girl on Stairs
description: Sun-bleached highlights catch the light as the subject gazes away, framed by the repeating lines of stone steps.

title: Bottom of a Sculpture
description: An abstract, high-contrast view of intersecting industrial forms, exploring shape and negative space.

title: Girl at Wall
description: A soft-focus portrait capturing a subtle expression, with warm and cool tones blending in the background.

title: Girl at Window
description: A candid moment of curiosity, as the subject peers into the weathered frame of an old window.

title: Girl on Pillar
description: A playful and direct gaze, where vibrant yellow in the foreground and hair creates a striking color harmony.

title: Arch Against the Sky
description: The smooth, sweeping curve of a monument against a vast and wispy blue sky.

title: Pass the Peanut Butter
description: Ethereal jellyfish trail delicate tentacles through an impossibly blue deep.

title: A Delicate Balance
description: A moment of serene impossibility, with stones stacked precariously against the ocean's shore.

title: Spring Blossoms
description: Dense clusters of white blossoms reach into a bright, clear turquoise sky.

title: Orion and Friends
description: The familiar constellation Orion stands out in a field of stars, a landmark in the deep night.

title: Whale Shark Exclamation Point
description: Sunlight filters through the water, illuminating the immense form of a whale shark below.

title: By the Pool
description: A vibrant close-up of a palm frond, its repeating lines creating a pattern of brilliant green.

title: Hibiscus Bloom
description: A macro view into the heart of a hibiscus flower, revealing a vivid gradient from yellow to deep pink.

title: Full Moon
description: A detailed and textured view of the lunar surface, stark and beautiful against the blackness of space.

title: Stone Stairs
description: Minimalist architecture in stone and glass, focusing on the clean lines and angles of a modern staircase.
